segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'd like some legal advice . Jane and I are thinking of incorporating . So Want to find out what sort of legal procedure one follows in forming a corporation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You begin by applying for a corporate charter . And then stockholders hold a meeting to organize the corporation , an individual has limited liability and the right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I have an idea that we get together to discuss this next week .
segments.speaker: S2
